info.title: pioneer-server
info.description: Pioneer is a multi-asset blockchain explorer and subscription service

get.description:
Status codes
===============
   -1: errored
    0: unknown
    1: built
    2: broadcasted
    3: confirmed
    4: fullfilled (swap completed)

ETH get token balance and info
